t: Amazon.com : USimplySeason Sumac Spice (Original Powder, 2.6 Ounce) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: This USimply sumac is excellent. It definitely is one of the best tasting out of maybe 6 brands I've tried over the years. The grind is slightly coarse so you can see the natural pieces of the original red "drupes" (little fruits like berries with a tiny pit) as they call them.
